title:
We are approaching the five year mark (May 2013)of The City of Wilmington unveiling a 10-Year Plan to End Chronic Homelessness; what is the status of this initiative? Is the city committing resources to see this plan through? How does this initiative fit in with current agenda issues (e.g. baseball stadium and various down town amenities)? 



When I click to the link to view the final plan (see below) it directs me to what appears to only be a cover page image; how can I obtain a copy of this plan?





http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/community_services/initiatives/ending_homelessness.aspx
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16170
